alert.note: Alert for Gove; Logan; Sheridan; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 2:11AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Thomas, eastern Logan, southwestern Sheridan and western Gove Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 211 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles southeast of Oakley, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Thomas, eastern Logan, southwestern Sheridan and western Gove Counties, including the following locations... Angelus and The Monument Rocks. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 73 and 87. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
